titleStmt.title: The touch-stone of common assurances. Or, A plain and familiar treatise, opening the learning of the common assurances or conveyances of the kingdome. By VVilliam Sheppard Esquire, sometimes of the Middle Temple.
titleStmt.author: Sheppard, William, d. 1675?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.F. for W. Lee, M. Walbancke, D. Pakeman, and G. Bedell,
